name: Cihan Tunc
content: Cihan Tunc | University of North Texas Cihan Tunc Computer Science and Engineering Assistant Professor Discovery Park F230 Office Hours:Wed 2:00 - 4:00 pm Cihan.Tunc@unt.edu About Faculty Info | Research Profile | Google Scholar | Education PhD, University of Arizona, 2015Electrical & Computer Engineering MS, Northeastern University, 2010Electrical & Computer Engineering BS, Bahcesehir University, 2008Electrical & Electronics Engineering (with a minor in Computer Engineering) Research Research Interests Cybersecurity, cloud computing, Internet of Things (IoT), autonomous vehicle security, and social media analysis for cybersecurity. Looking for PhD Students Hardworking and highly motivated prospective PhD students are encouraged to apply to work with me on cybersecurity, distributed computing, cloud computing, IoT, social media analysis, etc. For communication, please use the following link to fill out the form: URL Publications Please visit Faculty Info page and click "Publications" tab.
